ygData.subject: Re: Fortuneteller arrives
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I thought that Earth was smaller than Cybertron, and Unicron could eat that, albeit it took him a little longer.  Of course I just heard that from someone

OOC: I thought that Earth was smaller than Cybertron,
and Unicron could eat that, albeit it took him a
little longer.  Of course I just heard that from
someone else on this site, and if it's true the
Transformer people lack a sense of perspective.

BIC:  "Well then why not just eat this continent?  Or
this base for that matter?"

--- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> Organics:
>  
> The valkyrie walked over to the pilot.
> "Don't worry, he can't simply eat this world.  He's
> too small!" she said with a small smile.
> She shifted her gaze up, and he smile faded.  
> "I hope they don't try to mind control him or
> something," she said softly," they would unleash
> more trouble than any of us can handle."
> 
> Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
> Fortuneteller sensed a strange destiny ripple with
> the
> name "Malice", he was at least a potential father. 
> She would have to see if she could absorb his
> destiny
> energy along with Organics.
> 
> Then she looked up at the sky. If Unicron was here
> she couldn't imagine the true extent of his destiny
> energy, the power to snuff our worlds. It was more
> than she'd ever be able to absorb. While her orders
> remained to take Organics', she would see to taking
> at
> least a sample of Unicrons futures as well.
> 
> --- robert riley wrote:
> > Organics/ Megatron Revived:
> > 
> > "What questions? We have to get Malice back as
> soon
> > as we can!" Organics snapped, but soon apologized.
> > 
> > "Rodimus Prime? I do not believe I have had the
> > pleasure of meeting him. I wonde how Hot Rod has
> > been doing." Megatron Revived said with a grin.
> > 
> > airly2000 wrote:
> > YDrassil:::
> > 
> > "And ï¿½Rodimus Prime will have quiestion that have
> to
> > be answered..." 
> > said Ydrassil
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> > 
> > wrote:
> > > Megatron Revived/ Organics:
> > > 
> > > "How was he when he was taken? Was he
> > functioning? Was he 
> > fighting?" the clone asked in earnest.
> > > "Yes, he fought and nearly destroyed three of
> > them, but I was 
> > captured, and they took him." Organics said,
> walking
> > up to her step 
> > brother and esting her head on his broad chest.
> > > "Do hate for losing him?"
> > > The Emperor brought his right hand up and
> > comforted the smaller 
> > bot.
> > > "I have changed so since our last meeting. No, I
> > do not. We will 
> > retrieve him, but we must rest, all are weary
> right
> > now."
> > > 
> > > airly2000 wrote:
> > > Ydrassil:
> > > 
> > > Ydrassil looked them, without say nothing
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> > 
> > > wrote:
> > > > Megatron Revived/ Organics:
> > > > 
> > > > "I most certainly am not joking. I nearly
> > crashed into him when 
> > I 
> > > arrived. Besides, I have a score to settle with
> > him. He is here 
> > to 
> > > do what he attempted years ago: destroy the
> > Autobot Matrix."
> > > > 
> > > > Organics stepped forward as her step brother
> > brought the pilot 
> > > with him.
> > > > "And Unicron has his minions in full force. 
> > They managed to 
> > take 
> > > our brother, a most powerful bounty hunter. They
> > took him with 
> > > them, up there," she said, a little sad and
> point
> > up, to Unicron.
> > > > "WHAT?!?" the clone roared, clinching his
> fists.
> > 
> > > > Organics rushed to calm the Emperor clone, to
> > some avail.
> > >
